attributes.action: merge all of Scottish, Welsh, Northern Irish and English national teams into a single British team for all sporting events.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland is rightly represented in the olympic competition by a single national team.
Other sports such as the football world cup, rugby six nations and test cricket present fractured and unrepresentative teams from the member states of Britain.
All of the current national teams should be amalgamated into a single team to provide a large pool of talent from which to pick a team and also to promote Britishness.
